Rules.Expression: text.Contains("Bookmark") OR text.Contains("Share on") OR text.Contains("Share Article") OR text.Contains("Share This Story", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) OR text.Contains("Click to Share", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)

classlist.Contains("rotator-panels") OR classlist.Contains("rotator-pages") OR classlist.Contains("playlist") OR classlist.Contains("article-social") OR classlist.Contains("xwv-rotator") OR classlist.Contains("a-social-share-spacing") OR classlist.Contains("socialShare") OR classlist.Contains("heateor_sssp_sharing_ul") OR classlist.Contains("list-none") OR classlist.Contains("essb_links_list") OR classlist.Contains("simple-list") OR classlist.Contains("td-category") OR classlist.Contains("social-icons__list") OR classlist.Contains("authors")
